channel.title: Mexico on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Mexico on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Genetically, Central American mammoths were weird
item.description: The species’s boundaries in North America seem to have been fairly fluid.

item.title: The Plan to Turn the Caribbean’s Glut of Sargassum Into Biofuel
item.description: With record-breaking quantities of the seaweed set to hit Mexico’s beaches, experts propose converting it into biogas and construction materials, as well as using it to underwrite carbon credits.

item.title: The Plan to Turn the Caribbean’s Glut of Sargassum Into Biofuel
item.description: With record-breaking quantities of the seaweed set to hit Mexico’s beaches, experts propose converting it into biogas and construction materials, as well as using it to underwrite carbon credits.

item.title: Texas prepares for war as invasion of flesh-eating flies appears imminent
item.description: In Colombia, the parasites were caught expanding into endangered wild mountain tapirs.

item.title: Measles Cases Are Soaring in Mexico
item.description: The disease has claimed the lives of 12 people in the country this year, with the virus continuing to spread rapidly.
